snippet: Federal rules to protect the public have been imprisoned too long by the White House
abstract: Editorial criticizes Obama administration for its resistance to finalizing new regulations through the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs; stresses notable rules that have been held up, particularly on issues of food safety, labor protections and energy and environmental standards.
lead_paragraph: Federal rules to protect the public have been imprisoned too long by the White House

keywords.value: Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs (US)
keywords.name: organizations
